item.title: 交易日 中美宽松引发全球股市上涨
item.description: 周一，围绕中美贸易谈判的一阵乐观情绪和宽慰为全球股市再创新高提供了火箭燃料，而阿根廷市场则在哈维尔-米莱伊总统的执政党在中期选举中大获全胜后大幅飙升。【原文：A burst of optimism and relief around U.S.-China trade talks provided the rocket fuel to boost world stocks to new highs on Monday, while Argentina's markets surged after a thumping mid-term election victory for President Javier Milei's ruling party.】

item.title: 受中美贸易紧张局势影响，Cadence 预计第四季度利润低于预期
item.description: 由于中美贸易紧张局势有可能损害主要市场中国对其芯片设计软件的需求，Cadence 设计系统公司周一预计第四季度利润将略低于市场预期。【原文：Cadence Design Systems forecast fourth-quarter profit just shy of market estimates on Monday, as Sino-U.S. trade tensions threaten to hurt demand for its chip design software from key market China.】

item.title: 美国法官取消苹果应用商店集体诉讼资格
item.description: 周一，一名联邦法官取消了数千万苹果用户提起的集体诉讼的认证资格，这些用户指控苹果公司禁止在其应用程序商店以外的地方购买应用程序，从而垄断了 iPhone 应用程序市场，导致价格上涨。【原文：A federal judge on Monday decertified a class action by tens of millions of Apple customers who accused the company of monopolizing the market for iPhone apps by banning purchases outside its App Store, leading to higher prices.】

item.title: NextEra Energy 与谷歌合作重启爱荷华州核电厂
item.description: 美国公用事业公司 NextEra Energy 与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司达成了一项电力供应协议，这将有助于重启爱荷华州的杜安阿诺德核电站。【原文：U.S. utility NextEra Energy and Alphabet's Google have singed a power supply deal, which would help restart the Duane Arnold nuclear plant in Iowa.】

item.title: F5 警告称，令政府震惊的漏洞将拖累销售，股价下滑 10
item.description: 网络安全公司 F5 周一预测的年收入将低于华尔街的预期，并警告说，最近的一次系统漏洞事件引发了对美国和英国政府系统潜在风险的警觉，将损害对其服务的需求。【原文：Cybersecurity firm F5 forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates on Monday, warning that a recent systems breach that triggered alarm over potential risks to U.S. and UK government systems would hurt demand for its services.】

item.title: Canary Capital 计划于周二推出美国首只莱特币和赫德拉现货 ETF
item.description: Canary Capital 告诉路透社，它计划于周二上午在美国推出首批与莱特币和赫德拉加密货币挂钩的交易所交易产品。【原文：Canary Capital told Reuters that it plans to launch the first exchange-traded products in the United States tied to the litecoin and hedera cryptocurrencies on Tuesday morning.】

item.title: 百事公司解决了有关佳得乐饮料棒健康声明的诉讼
item.description: 百事公司已经解决了一起诉讼，该诉讼指控百事公司虚假宣传其佳得乐蛋白棒对人体有益，尽管这些蛋白棒的含糖量超过了蛋白质，比士力架和巧克力霜灌篮甜甜圈的含糖量还高。【原文：PepsiCo has resolved a lawsuit accusing it of falsely marketing its Gatorade protein bars as good for you, though they contain more sugar than protein and more sugar than Snickers bars and chocolate-frosted Dunkin' donuts.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，派拉蒙公司将于周三进行首轮裁员，裁减 1,000 个职位
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引一位熟悉派拉蒙天舞公司计划的人士的话报道，派拉蒙天舞公司将于周三开始一轮大规模裁员，裁员人数将达到 1000 人。【原文：Paramount Skydance will begin a major round of layoffs with 1,000 job cuts on Wednesday, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing a person familiar with the company's plans.】

item.title: 俄罗斯卢克石油公司称因西方制裁打算出售国际资产
item.description: 俄罗斯第二大石油生产商卢克石油公司周一表示，"由于一些国家对公司及其子公司采取限制性措施"，该公司将出售其国际资产。【原文：Russia's second-largest oil producer, Lukoil , said on Monday it would sell its international assets "owing to introduction of restrictive measures against the company and its subsidiaries by some states."】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国为德国解决俄罗斯石油公司问题设定了六个月的最后期限
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周一援引熟悉此事的人士的话报道称，华盛顿已经向柏林提出了六个月的最后期限，以解决影响俄罗斯石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft）德国资产的所有权问题，从而使俄罗斯石油公司暂时免受美国制裁。【原文：Washington has floated a six-month deadline for Berlin to sort out the ownership limbo affecting the German assets of Russian oil major Rosneft , allowing Rosneft to be temporarily exempted from U.S. sanctions, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，德国 SAP 正在酝酿收购软件公司 BlackLine
item.description: 据路透社和一位熟悉内情的人士查阅的一份要约函副本显示，欧洲最大的软件供应商 SAP 今年 6 月曾提出以近 45 亿美元的价格收购会计软件公司 BlackLine，但遭到拒绝。【原文：SAP , Europe's largest software provider, offered to buy accounting software firm BlackLine for nearly $4.5 billion in June but was rebuffed and is now considering whether to pursue the company again, according to a copy of the offer letter reviewed by Reuters and a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道亚马逊目标裁员多达3万人
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的人士透露，亚马逊计划从周二开始裁减多达 3 万个公司职位，因为该公司正努力削减开支，并弥补大流行病高峰期过度招聘的损失。【原文：Amazon is planning to cut as many as 30,000 corporate jobs beginning Tuesday, as the company works to pare expenses and compensate for overhiring during the peak demand of the pandemic, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 任命内部人士 Vishal Shah 担任关键的人工智能职位
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）周一表示，已任命内部人士 Vishal Shah 担任与人工智能相关的重要职务，负责人工智能产品的产品管理。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg has appointed insider Vishal Shah to a key artificial intelligence-linked role, heading product management for AI products, the social media giant said on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平在韩国举行会谈前企业担忧加剧
item.description: 围绕中美贸易战，全球企业有一长串的担忧。它们将密切关注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平预计于周四在韩国举行的会晤，希望世界上最大的两个经济体开始解决分歧。【原文：Global companies have a long list of concerns around the U.S.-China trade war. They will closely monitor President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping's expected meeting in South Korea on Thursday, hoping that the world's two biggest economies begin to resolve their differences.】

item.title: LSEG 与 Anthropic 合作，为 Claude 用户提供金融数据访问服务
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group）周一表示，它正在与人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 合作，让 Claude 用户可以访问通过伦敦证券交易所集团产品授权的数据。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group on Monday said it is collaborating with artificial intelligence startup Anthropic to give Claude users access to data licensed through LSEG products.】

item.title: Meta 推出 "幽灵帖子"，24 小时后在主题上消失
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta 周一在其 Threads 应用程序上推出了在上传 24 小时后自动存档的帖子（被称为 "幽灵帖子"），模仿其他平台上的流行功能。【原文：Social media giant Meta launched on Monday posts that are automatically archived 24 hours after being uploaded, dubbed "ghost posts," on its Threads app, mimicking a popular feature available on its other platforms.】

item.title: Blackstone 聘请前阿波罗高管领导欧洲私募股权投资业务
item.description: 全球最大的另类资产管理公司 Blackstone 周一表示，已任命私募市场同行 Apollo 的一名前高管主管其欧洲企业私募股权投资业务，在现任高管晋升后填补这一职位。【原文：Blackstone has appointed a former executive at private markets peer Apollo to head its European corporate private equity business, filling the role after the incumbent was promoted, the world's biggest alternative asset manager said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国政府关门：美国政府关门：如何影响关键经济数据的发布
item.description: 由于共和党和民主党未能达成协议，将拨款延长至 9 月 30 日联邦财政年度结束之后，美国政府于 10 月 1 日关闭了大部分业务。【原文：The U.S. government shut down much of its operations on October 1 after Republicans and Democrats failed to reach an agreement to extend funding past the end of the federal fiscal year on September 30.】

item.title: 钻井需求减弱，油田巨头转向蓬勃发展的人工智能基础设施
item.description: 油田服务巨头 SLB、哈里伯顿（Halliburton）和贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）正在转向数据中心和相关的人工智能基础设施工作，以推动下一阶段的增长，同时应对钻井需求放缓和北美各地钻机闲置的问题。【原文：Oilfield services giants SLB , Halliburton and Baker Hughes are turning to data centers and related artificial intelligence infrastructure work to drive their next phase of growth as they navigate slowing drilling demand and idle rigs across North America.】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆表示同意特朗普将贸易期限延长 "几周"
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆周一表示，她已于周六与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普进行了通话，两国将把贸易期限延长 "几周"，以便与华盛顿讨论悬而未决的问题。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Monday she spoke with U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday and that the two countries will extend a trade deadline for "a few more weeks" to discuss pending issues with Washington.】

item.title: 独家报道美国能源部与 AMD 建立价值 10 亿美元的超级计算机和人工智能合作伙伴关系
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）和 AMD 首席执行官苏丽莎（Lisa Su）告诉路透社，美国已与先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）建立了价值 10 亿美元的合作伙伴关系，以建造两台超级计算机，用于解决从核能、癌症治疗到国家安全等各种大型科学问题。【原文：The U.S. has formed a $1 billion partnership with Advanced Micro Devices to construct two supercomputers that will tackle large scientific problems ranging from nuclear power to cancer treatments to national security, Energy Secretary Chris Wright and AMD CEO Lisa Su told Reuters.】

item.title: 埃克森支持的碳核算集团首席执行官表示将任命独立小组
item.description: Carbon Measures 是一项新的碳核算倡议，得到了一些大型能源和跨国公司的支持，其首席执行官告诉路透社，该倡议将成立一个独立小组来帮助指导其工作。【原文：Carbon Measures, a new carbon accounting initiative backed by a number of big energy and multinational companies, will create an independent panel to help guide its work, its chief executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 伯克希尔被 KBW 评为 "表现不佳"，KBW 援引 Geico、关税和巴菲特的观点
item.description: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods 将伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）的评级下调至 "表现不佳"，称汽车保险利润率下降、关税、利率下降、清洁能源税收抵免减少以及沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的离职将拖累其股价。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway has been downgraded to "underperform" by Keefe, Bruyette & Woods, which said lower car insurance margins, tariffs, falling interest rates, smaller clean energy tax credits and Warren Buffett's departure will weigh on its share price.】

item.title: 大型利率市场交易预计美联储资产负债表松绑结束
item.description: 上周末，美国利率市场上出现了大量大宗交易，似乎是在美联储宣布最终结束其长期资产负债表缩减计划（即量化紧缩计划）之前进行的。【原文：A sizable block trade in the U.S. rates market late last week appeared to be positioning ahead of the Federal Reserve's expected announcement to finally end its long-running balance sheet reduction program, known as quantitative tightening (QT).】

item.title: 政府停摆第 27 天，1400 多架航班延误
item.description: 由于空中交通管制员缺勤继续扰乱出行，联邦政府停摆已进入第 27 天，继周日有 8,600 多架次航班晚点后，周一又有 1,400 多架次航班延误。【原文：More than 1,400 flights were delayed on Monday after more than 8,600 late flights Sunday as air traffic controller absences continue to disrupt travel and a federal government shutdown reached its 27th day.】

item.title: 瑞银申请美国银行执照，着眼于增长
item.description: 瑞士联合银行周一表示，该行已申请美国国家银行执照，彰显了其在美国市场的发展雄心。【原文：UBS has filed an application for a national banking licence in the United States, the Swiss bank said on Monday, underlining its growth ambition for the U.S. market.】

item.title: 高通公司加速推动数据中心发展，明年将推出新的人工智能芯片
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm）周一发布了两款面向数据中心的人工智能芯片，并将于明年开始投入商用。【原文：Qualcomm on Monday unveiled two artificial intelligence chips for data centers, with commercial availability from next year, as it pushes to diversify beyond smartphones and expand into the fast-growing AI infrastructure market.】

item.title: 世贸组织负责人表示，美国对多边贸易体系的许多批评是有道理的
item.description: 世贸组织总干事恩古齐-奥孔乔-伊韦拉（Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala）周一表示，美国对多边贸易体系的一些批评是有道理的。【原文：WTO Director-General Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala said on Monday that some of the United States' criticisms of the multilateral trading system were valid.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，高盛正在洽谈 100 亿美元的科威特委托业务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，高盛（Goldman Sachs）正在洽谈为其资产管理部门获得科威特财富基金 100 亿美元的授权。【原文：Goldman Sachs is in talks to secure a $10 billion mandate from Kuwait's wealth fund for its asset-management arm, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 芝加哥联储公布 10 月份失业率为 4.35%，与上次官方报告相比变化不大
item.description: 根据芝加哥联邦储备银行的经济模型，美国 10 月份的失业率稳定在 4.3% 左右，该模型使用私人数据来估算失业率，即使在没有政府统计数据的情况下也是如此。【原文：The U.S. unemployment rate remained stable at around 4.3% in October according to a Chicago Federal Reserve bank economic model that uses private data to estimate the jobless rate even in the absence of government statistics that have been unavailable since the start of an ongoing federal shutdown.】
